title: frame and summoner icon
body: why i didn t get my frame and summoner icon for silver..i was silver 2 in seson 6 .......

replies.body: If you haven't received your reward yet, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We're happy to take a look at your issue individually to see what's going on.  We're happy to add rewards if able, and you may have just been missed somehow.  We'll respond to your ticket asap!
